spins2cpu: A Monte Carlo Simulation Code for the Phase Transition in 2D/3D Materials

Usage Example:

spins2cpu -h

spins2cpu -x 500 -y 500 -c square -t 35 -r

spins2cpu -x 500 -y 500 -t 0 30 5 30 40 1 40 45 0.4 45 51 1 -r

spins2cpu -x 500 -y 500 -c square -t 0 20 2 20 28 0.4 28 36 1 -r

spins2cpu -x 500 -y 500 -c honeycomb -i afm1 -p -1 -t 0 16 2 16 20 0.2 20 26 1 -r -w 200
